feed.title: Google Cloud: App Engine flexible environment Ruby
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: App Engine flexible environment Ruby

entry.content: To increase security, starting in March 2025, support for Transport Layer Security (TLS) version 1.1 and earlier is deprecated. Update your application settings in the App Engine flexible environment to use TLS version 1.2 and later, along with a corresponding secure set of cipher suites (Preview).
entry.summary: Support for TLS 1.1 and earlier is deprecated starting March 2025. Update your application settings to use TLS 1.2 and later.
entry.title: Feature: TLS Deprecation Update

entry.content: Support for the Ruby 3.4 runtime is in General Availability (GA).
entry.summary: Ruby 3.4 runtime is now generally available for App Engine flexible environment.
entry.title: Feature: Ruby 3.4 runtime now available
